reviews.review:
A game where you huddle up with your friends and fight of hordes of strange creature that kind of looks like the junkie bogons that live down the road. Look out for Mr Huggy, he likes to give hugs but he’ll smother you like that ex girlfriend that won’t stop calling.

8/10 would f invisible chick.
amazing game !!
игра классная но есть недаработки

Ярчайший пример того, что из обыкновенного мода для Unreal Tournament 2004 превращается в титана кооперативных игор - и это Killing Floor!

––––––––
  
 Killing Floor – это эпичный Survival Horror с Кооперативом, где важна командная работа. Берсерк танчит, а Медик его хилит, Коммандос со Снайпером прикрывают своих напарников, Инженер не допускает появлению монстров в определенном секторе, а вот Пироманьяк с Подрывником безумствуют где-то в краю. Короче говоря, чем команда слаженно работают между собой, тем больше шансов, что они затащат эту игру. 
 Цель игры проста - выжить! Выжить как можно дольше, попутно закупаясь у Трейдора и удирать от лап Отбивальщика.
 Уничтожайте орды мутантов, разнесите бошку Толстяка, взрывайте толпу Клотов, раздовите е-б-у-ч-и-х Ползунов и закройте рот истеричным с-у-ч-к-а-м, и, о боже, за это вам даже платят, чтобы приобрести более могучие пушки для этих уродов! И не забывайте прикрывать спины вашим сослуживцам.

––––––––

Изюминки игры:

- Кооператив до 6 игроков!
- 7 разных перков, от медика до НЕИСТОВОГО БЕРСЕРКА! Их можно апать [strike] з-а-д-р-о-т-с-т-в-у-я [/strike] выполняя определенные задачки, такие как: "Нанести миллион (да, да, миллион!) урон огнем; разнести 9000 бошек мутантов и т.д".
- 10 разных видов, нет, не зомби, А НЕУДАЧНЫХ ЭКСПЕРИМЕНТОВ, которые жаждут полакомиться вашей нежной плотью. А главный гвоздь программы - [spoiler] ОБЕЗУМЕВШИЙ ДОКТОР КЕВИН КЛАМЕЛИ, БОЛЕЕ ИЗВЕСТНЫЙ КАК "ПАТРИАРХ"! [/spoiler]
- Про оружии можно и не говорить, просто мечта манчкинов!
- Полностью открытые карты, еще немного нелинейные. Прячьтесь хоть в самом незаметно углу карты, или же наоборот, обороняйтесь в эпицентре битвы!
- Сэндбокс и Steamworkshop как-бы намекают, что в игре туева-куча модов, так что вы не соскучитесь, если приелся ванильный KF. Хоть нудистов-мутантов или Гордонов Фрименов с Мастером Чифом поставьте!

––––––––

Сюжет игры прост – все началось с корпорации «Horzine Biotech», получившие заказ на создание универсальных солдат, которые могли бы превосходить своих “человеческих” коллег, имевшие даже определенные паранормальные способности. Но что-то происходит не так, ученый постепенно сходит с ума и начинает создавать орду (нет, не зомби) клонов! И так точно, он намеревается ЗАХВАТИТЬ МИР! И мы, славные игроки, выступаем в роли Наемников и должны искоренить зло от всего мира, а попутно уничтожить и того безумного [spoiler] Ученого [/spoiler]. 

Соглашусь, сюжет как в низкобюджетном фильме Уве Болла, но важен ли он для взрывного шутера? Определенно нет! 

––––––––

Графон - 10 из 10, а если настроить гамму, яркость и контраст, то может дать отпор любому Крузису!
Звук - 10 из 10
Музыка - 10 из 10
Геймплей - 15 из 10!
Фан от игры - 25 из 10!!!
КОЛИЧЕСТВО МЯСЦО - 60 ИЗ 10!!!!!!

Общая оценка - over9000! Покупайте, не пожалейте, да еще разработку KF2 ускорите!
Un juego bastante divertido... perdi largas horas de mi vida en este juego!!! fue Genial... jajaja

I bought this game after playing Call of Duty Zombies and I was looking for a different kind of challenge when shooting at zombies. One of my friend told me "killing floor is probably one of the best Zombie games out there and it is cheap, and very addictive". Little did I know, he was absolutely right.

Tons of achievements to unlock, perks to level, guns to buy and, OH HECK the game is f****** difficult! I love a good challenge and Killing floor delivers on that.

A must for Zombie lovers!

--------------------------------------------------------------
Single Player: 7/10 It is fun to play alone to train your spamming skills on Zeds. Nothing beats multiplayer though.
Multiplayer: 10/10 One of the best Survival Horror out there. Tons of guns, 9 different types of zombies with an epic boss and up to 6 players in the same server. Use your perks wisely and kill them Zeds like there is no tomorrow!
Graphics: 6/10 First installment of Killing Floor was based off a mod. Textures could be better, I give it a respectable grade because of guts and gore.
Community: 8/10 Good players, HUGE workshop, tons of items
--------------------------------------------------------------

When this game decides it want to run and not give me error messages, it's a lot of fun. one of the best survival games I have ever played. The guns are fun to use and players usually help each other out. if you like monsters and like shooting at monsters, and being murdered by monsters, then buy this game.

on a side note, the fleshpound doesn't want to hug you. you should probally run......

Good game, but unpolished.  

Good: 

The gameplay is fun, challenging, balanced.  Mechanics force players to work together.  All classes (including Medic) are fun to play.  Progression system gives you a reason to keep playing.  Most community members are nice, and it's easy to find beginner servers.

Annoying: 

No in-game explanation on how to play.  Jumping into the middle of a game doesn't work well unless people give you cash.  Game frequently goes into slow-mo for a few seconds, based on not only your own actions, but other players' as well- can be jarring.  Your XP can reset for seemingly no reason.

отличная игра,очень затягивает. особенно интересно с друзьями по сети играть. нет ничего личнего все просто и понятно стреляй убивай получай деньги и опыт,два основных режима игры.вообщем очень доволен игрой,да и еще купил по акции,просто не нарадуюсь.

A whole ton of fun in one package. Like Zombies or Zeds in this case. You'll like this one. I found in this game a lot of good friends in multiplayer and let's be honest. This game even if old, there's always someone playing it. I want to just say even with mods or addons from the community I find the game very fun and lets be honest, it's a shooter and they actually give you other weapons and a change of view like when zooming. Even more the classes have benefits and always work together. Believe it or not, that one guy who you may not like thier name may be saving your ass. I do believe that this game has potential there is lag but that's on server and host. However I find that the game has good moments. DLC bes on sale and to be honest, I enjoyed this game. All LVL 6 legit. Good to fuck around with but remember there is a difficulty setting those who are for the serious I want to survive hardcore with a team play by it. Those who want easy fun let's fuck around go for easy or medium. I'm just saying the game has it's own level of players and to be honest it's mixed. 10/10 though in my book.
that moment when you think fleshpound is husk...

在和小伙伴玩了几个小时后，把原来写的差评删掉了，改成了好评。
虽然游戏模式依然单调，但是多人模式下，各职业间的搭配，各种武器的配合，还有玩家之间的默契，还是非常有趣的。
不过单人模式下，依旧乏味的很，我连练级都没有兴趣。
如果你有好基友能和你一起玩，那么还是非常值得入手的，否则还是别买了，就算和网络上不认识的人玩也没什么意思，配合不默契互相坑不说，一般不认识的玩家之间也很少会交流。
有人说那种慢动作机制非常带感，但是个人觉得倒是比较一般，经常要打的时候突然被旁边的人引发慢动作了，那感觉就像遇到了延迟卡顿一样很不舒服。不过被丧尸包围的时候，倒是确实比较实用。
killing floor 2也快出了，能多点可玩的内容就好了，希望模式或者玩法再丰富一些。

Killing floor on täydellinen aivot narikkaan kokemus, jossa päämäränä on selvitä horde tyyliin 7-30 erää (hostin valitsema määrä) jotka vaikeutuvat erä erältä ja kaiken lopuksi pitäisi vielä piestä patriarkka. Patriarkka on kestävä kuin tankki ja omaa minigunin ja singon lisäksi kyvyn muuttua näkymätömäksi. Jos kuulostaa vaikealta niin sitä se onkin, mutta juuri tässä piilee killing floorin viehätys. Ensimmäinen vaikeustaso on kuin kävely puistossa, mutta jo normal-vaikeustaso saa hampaiden kiristelyä aikaan hiemankaan huonommassa ryhmässä.
Pelissä on erillaisia vihollis tyyppejä Left 4 Dead tapaan. 
Perus zombi ei paljoa huoleta, mutta se voi tarttua pelaajasta kiinni ja näinollen tarjota isommille mölleille tilaisuuden helppoon tappoon.
Crawler on pieni ja matala, sekä se hyppii päin pelaajan näköä lähietäisyydellä, joten siihen on vaikea osua.
Husk ampuu tulipalloja järkyttävistä etäisyyksistä aiheuttaen tarkka-ampujille ongelmia.
Lödöstä suoraan pöllitty lihava oksennus zombi pistää räjähtäessään näön pimeäksi ja aiheuttaa silmitöntä vahinkoa.
Gorefast on perus zombista nopeampi versio, joka jatkaa menoaan jopa ilman päänuppia, joten karkuun juoksu vaikeutuu huomattavasti.
Siren huutaa niin lujaa, että se pysäyttää singot ja kranaatit kuin seinään, samalla tehden vahinkoa pelaajiin.
Stalker on heikko, mutta näkymätön ja kohtuu suuri kiusankappale.
Scrake on iso jampperi jolla on moottorisaha ja ottaessaan tarpeeksi vahinkoa se käy pelaajan kimppuun apinan raivolla.
Sitten kaikista suurin ongelma eli Fleshpound.
Fleshpound syö luoteja kuin sieni ja pelkästään raivostuu pienemmistä tuliaseista. Se myös pistää pelaajat kylmäksi jo kahdesta lyönnistä, joten koko tiimin on työskenneltävä yhdessä sen kaatamiseen, varsinkin jos niitä on kaksi liikkeellä samaan aikaan.
Peliin tuo lisämaustetta myös eri hahmoluokat joista pelaaja voi valita.
Field medic pitää huolta muiden pelaajien kunnosta ja on erikoistunut konepistooleihin.
Support specialist hitsaa ovia kiinni pitääkseen kalmot loitolla ja suosii haulikoita.
Kuten nimestä voi päätellä sharpshooter erikoistuu kivääreihin ja pistooleihin.
Commando näkee vihollisten elämät ja stalkereiden näkymättömyydestäkään ei ole hyötyä. Ase varastoon kuuluu kaikenmailman konekiväärit tommygunista faliin.
Firebug pistää maailman palamaan ja Demolisher räjäyttää maailman taivaan tuuliin.
Hurjapäisimmille pelaajille on myös Berserker, joka on up close and personal melee hahmo, jonka arsenaaliin kuuluu kaikki viikatteesta palokirveeseen. Berserker ottaa myös livempää vahinkoa, mutta se ei paljon paina vaikeammilla tasoilla. Hahmoluokkien tehokkuutta voi myös kehittää pelatessa.
Peli sisältää myös mielettömän määrän aseita ja skinejä joita ostamalla pelaamisesta tulee sen asteen hauskempaa, kuten stempunk ase pakkaukset, jonka antimista suosikkini on höyryhaulikko.
Musiikit ovat raskasta kissankuritus/kirkonpolttometallia, jotka sopivat mutaatio muusituksen taustalle mainiosti.
Jos siis aaltopohjainen kimppateurastus kutittaa kasuaalipelaajan nystyröitä, niin killing flooria pahemmaksi on vaikea pistää. Ps. Jouluisin ja halloweenin aikaan zombit saavat juhlan mukaisen ulkoasun ja mikäpä olisi tonttujen ja joulupukkien lahtaamista huvittavampaa?
หนุกๆ :D

For me, This was my "Call of Duty Zombies" without all of the incessant and rude 8 year olds who have nothing better to do that cry about counsels. I enjoyed logging weeks of gameplay into the title with friends and strangers alike, gaining levels and experience. I liked how the company is always working on new and fun content to add to the game, instead of just abandoning it like some developers do after it becomes marketable. Well worth the price, but I know it always goes on sale during the Summer Sale, so wait until then to get a nice deal on the game and DLC, because some of the guns are just plain awesome.

This game is dumb.  The music, the dialogue, the color scheme, the gore-- all so tacky and awful.  But I love it!   It's a great shoot-em-up, and this game is a ton of fun to play with a buddy.  Plus I love that they have theme skins every Halloween and Christmas!  Can't wait for the sequel!

Despite only having played alittle I must completely recommend this game! It might not be the best zombie killing game out there but it sure is fun once you find the class you were born to be! I also love, and kind of hate, the semi-realistic recoil you get with the guns. It makes sence getting recoil with heavy machine guns which kind of throws you off but also can make headshots easier in a wierd sence. I hope you enjoy this game as much as I did with a trial lisence. I know I will be buying this game once I get the money to!

The game has no real storyline that I could see right off the bat, but other than that... I love the diverse choice of zombies in this game! It's not just your typical zombie that will try to grab you... you have to have the right weapons and strategies or you won't survive long as the flood overwhelms you! Great atmosphere, gameplay, and sounds. I can see this game as/being a classic!

The floor was not killing

Начнем с положительного.
Игра затягивает, есть интересные карты в которых мелкие пауканы выпрыгивают и ты как вертуша ищешь этого мелкого паука. Дальше многообразие оружия и перков, каждый чем-то своим хорош и на сложных уровнях обязательно требуется, при больших количествах так вообще. 
Графика, музыка и главное на слабых компах все летает. 
Моды еще плюсом стали, долгие карта по заданию прям ваа стали. 
Недостатки:
Мало обновлений и внесение корректировок, например перк "Поджигателя" имеет самое минимальное количество оружия и это обидно, как будто насрали на него.
Карты, раньше были карты и какие-то изменения, сейчас да уже поменьше, но все же интерес пока есть, хочется чтобы еще двигались дальше.
Игру стоит купить обязательно, конечно вы не будете играть в неё каждый день, но для отдыха поубивать их можно.
Great game to play, really good co-op game.  I would definitely take a look at the modding community, as there are plenty of fun maps to download as well as some interesting mods.
хуйня
very awesome game, if you like fps like l4d and l4d2 this is a nice change of pace for an arcade style game
Do you like killing zombies? If yes play this game.
Amazing game!! love it. the only problem i have is when i host a game friends have problems connecting to me and cant :(

If you can get some friends to play this game, you're gonna have a blast. Part strategy, part twitchy fps, this game is real good fun. It takes some time to master and feels very grindy at times, but the action is really intense and cooperation is of the utmost importance. The first time you beat the game on suicidal difficulty is among the sweetest experiences there's to be had.

This game is amazing, The co-op AND single player are amazing and sometimes difficult, I know right?

It is a great game afterall, Go ahead and buy it or get a demo ;) Zombie killing at its finest...
A great and challenging game that is well worth the money
Bought Killing Floor 2 weeks ago..... Already Clocked 240 hours of gameplay.... FPS COOP HORROR ZOMBIES
LOADS OF MONEY!!!

Very good game, looking forward to KF2!

It's kind of like dust II but you can look down your sights with zombies.
杀地板这款游戏，怎么说呢，玩的人不是很多，这点就挺尴尬的，但我感觉这游戏非常棒，尤其是僵尸的形象设计做得很好，战斗也很爽快，反正这种畅快杀戮、一人屠万尸的快感都是第一人称僵尸游戏的特色，但是其人气不如L4D系列还是令人感到遗憾，和L4D2比起来，我反而更偏向于杀地板，原因很多，主要还有个原因：这游戏有机瞄……可能是我长时间玩有机瞄FPS游戏养成的一种强迫症吧……

Fun repetitive zombie shooter, but for its sale price it's great.

7/10

This game is one of the ultimate time killers out there....holy flaming titties batman, you've wasted days worth of your life playing this? Decent online community once you get up to the harder difficulties, endless amount of achievements to make you feel like you never complete the game, constant updates from the makers with steady DLC, events and new maps. For the $5 I purchased it at, it's a total steal as I have 30 times that in hours spent at the moment. The game is simple, and quite straightforward, with tips and tricks to learn as you progress up the difficulty chart. Only quibble is that perk leveling is unbalanced and somewhat ridiculous.
it's pretty fun I mean do you really need me to tell you about it, it's killing floor. you probably already own it.

Amazing game to wind down from a long day. Multiplayer is very active still. It may be an older game, but it's very easy to run. I would recommend waiting until a big sale before buying because it always gets pretty deeply discounted.

In Killing Floor you kill man-made zombies on various different levels, with a wide assortment of weapons. And with Steam Workshop there is constantly more content being added , which means constantly more fun being added.

Do you have no friends? No worries! This is the game for you! With Killing Floor you don't need any! Just jump into a server with people in it already and kill some shit!

By far one of the best, most fun FPS games out there.

Leveling up perks takes alot of time but I view that as a positive because it means more time to play this amazing game!

Who doesn't love to burn flesh, blow up some shit, and clop some heads off? I personally find that very entertaining, do you?

Gotta love those british accents.

10/10 awaiting Killing Floor 2.
